snippet.title: The Void of Desires - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
After 1,5 years of hard work, independent game developer team is proud to release their first project - The Void of Desires.
This game tells a story of two space refugees and their fight against demigod creature - Constructor. Their goal is to get to the wishmaster in the depths of ancient temple in the space, to fulfill their desires.
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1152230/
